appName.description: Blocks contents about Alliance 90/The Greens and others.

appShortName.description: Blocks contents about Alliance 90/The Greens and others.

appDescription.message: Greens Blocker - Blocks contents about Alliance 90/The Greens and others.

showConfirmation.message: You block the entire content of this website at our own request with our Bündnis90 / Die Grünen Content Blocker. We draw your attention to the fact that compulsory information of the side provider to imprint, data protection and liability can also be blocked. Click on 'Cancel' to leave this page or on 'OK' if you really want to stay on this page.
showConfirmation.description: Obligatory information of the side provider to imprint, data protection and liability can also be blocked. Better get away fast!

blockDeSpdName.description: Block the Social Democratic Party of Germany (SPD).

blockDeCduName.description: Block the Christian Democratic Union of Germany (CDU).

blockDeCsuName.description: Block the Christian Social Union in Bavaria (CSU).

blockDeAfDNotice.message: * To block the Alternative for Germany (AfD), use the original AfD-Blocker by Die PARTEI. Alternatively you can block Die PARTEI itself. The systems filters all contents including 'die partei' case-insensitive, whereby the one or the other content by AfD would be blocked as well.

blockTrAkpName.description: Block the Justice and Development Party (AKP).
